title: Sexism in advertising in the U.S. 2016
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Share of..., and Unnamed: 1 in each Share of... on the y axis.

The Unnamed: 1 is appeared to be the highest at Share of... ...respondents who have seen ads that portay women as dumb helpless or incompetent and lowest at Share of... ...respondents who have seen advertising they deem "offensive" to women.
The difference of Unnamed: 1 between the highest and lowest Share of... is 9.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unnamed: 1 for 4 number of Share of...s.

Share of... ...respondents who have seen ads that portay women as dumb helpless or incompetent has the highest Unnamed: 1 and ...respondents who have seen advertising they deem "offensive" to women has the lowest Unnamed: 1.
Share of... ...female respondents who have been offended by sexism in advertising has the second highest value for Unnamed: 1.

The highest Share of... ...respondents who have seen ads that portay women as dumb helpless or incompetent has 9.0 more Unnamed: 1 than the lowest Share of... ...respondents who have seen advertising they deem "offensive" to women.

The Share of... ...respondents who have seen ads that portay women as dumb helpless or incompetent has the highest Unnamed: 1, followed by ...female respondents who have been offended by sexism in advertising, and ...respondents who have seen ads they find ridiculous in how they portray women. Down to the Share of... ...respondents who have seen advertising they deem "offensive" to women which is the lowest.
The average Unnamed: 1 in all 4 Share of...s is 81.75.
Summing up the values of all Share of...s, we get total 327.0.
